channel.title: xamarin-iOS on Pains.net
channel.description: Recent content in xamarin-iOS on Pains.net

item.title: Build and Deploy Xamarin.iOS to Test Flight with Azure DevOps
item.description: Everybody knows how hard it is to work with iOS apps from a windows environment (mostly). I've had to deal with it and here is my experience building and deploying iOS app from a build/release pipeline in Azure DevOps.
